description: Compute the transitive reduction of directed graphs. Graphviz filters: acyclic, bcomps, comps, edgepaint, gvcolor, gvpack, mingle, nop, sccmap, tred, & unflatten. More information: https://www.graphviz.org/pdf/tred.1.pdf.

useCases.description: Construct the transitive reduction graph of one or more directed graphs:
